name: First Person Broomer
description:
First Person Shooter project: Gameplay demo

Sweep enemies. Annihilate a chicken.


In this game, you use your trusty magical broom to sweep objects at high velocity. Don't get seen by the enemy and hit them with speedy things in the metal chassis. Get to the end of the one level and shoot away the chicken to win.

WARNING: Play in High quality or higher. Else you won't see the enemy's light-cone/sights.

Controls:

P - Pause

WASD - move

LSHIFT - slow move

LMB - sweep

SPACE - jump
